features: VERSATILE STEAM CONTROL: The nonstick iron has a dial that lets you adjust the amount of steam, plus spray and blast buttons. The spray button is perfect for targeting stubborn wrinkles, while blast is great for steam ironing or vertical steaming.

EASY IRONING WITH NONSTICK SOLEPLATE: The durable, nonstick soleplate on this steam iron glides smoothly over all fabrics to get wrinkles out without sticking. Ironing is easy whether you're ironing a delicate dress for a party or everyday t-shirts.
AUTOMATIC SHUTOFF FOR PEACE OF MIND: This steam iron for clothes shuts off automatically after 1 hour and has a reset button that turns the iron back on and resets the timer.
QUICKLY REMOVE WRINKLES FROM HANGING CLOTHES: Freshen clothes and loosens wrinkles right on the hanger with the vertical steam function on the clothes iron — no ironing board needed.

IRON A VARIETY OF CLOTHING & FABRICS: With adjustable fabric settings, it's easy to select the right temperature for a variety of different fabrics from cottons and linens to synthetics, silk and wool.
body.description: The Proctor Silex Nonstick Iron has versatile steam control. It has spray / blast buttons and adjustable steam settings. The nonstick soleplate glides smoothly over fabrics or use vertical steam to remove wrinkles from clothes on the hanger.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tested. Proven. Reliable products at reasonable prices. It’s not just a tagline, it’s what has lead our product development for decades. Every Proctor Silex appliance begins its journey in our engineering lab. Motors rotate, switches turn and mechanical arms spin for days on end, testing each function and feature. Then it’s off to the kitchen, where the staff uses the product much like you would – cooking and creating to ensure it will make your life a bit easier. Only when an appliance passes our rigorous testing do we know it’s ready for your home. Proctor Silex Iron & Vertical Steamer for Clothes with Nonstick Soleplate, 1200 Watts, Adjustable Spray and Blast Steam Settings, Auto Shutoff This efficient, no-nonsense iron is designed with adjustable steam settings to give you full control of how much steam to use with different fabrics and clothing. The optional fine-mist spray is excellent for eliminating stubborn wrinkles, while the blast button releases quick bursts of extra steam for steam ironing or vertical steaming clothes on the hanger. The iron has a durable, nonstick soleplate that glides smoothly over all fabrics. It gets wrinkles out without sticking to the fabrics, whether you're ironing a delicate dress for a party or everyday shirts and slacks. Versatile steam control — with spray and blast buttons plus adjustable steam settings The perfect iron when you want performance to smooth out tough wrinkles, without complicated features that you don't need With vertical steam, you can freshen clothes and loosen wrinkles from garments without an ironing board Iron a variety of clothing and fabrics with adjustable fabric settings Easily fill and check water level

Easy Ironing with Nonstick Soleplate The durable, nonstick soleplate glides smoothly over all fabrics to get wrinkles out without sticking to fabrics. Ironing is easy whether you're ironing a delicate dress for a party or everyday t-shirts.

Versatile Steam Control The iron has a dial that lets you adjust the amount of steam, plus spray and blast buttons. The spray button is perfect for targeting stubborn wrinkles, while the blast button is great for steam ironing or vertical steaming. Automatic Shutoff for Peace of Mind The iron shuts off automatically after 1 hour and has a reset button that turns the iron back on and resets the timer. Quickly Remove Wrinkles from Hanging Clothes Freshen clothes and loosen wrinkles right on the hanger with vertical steam — no ironing board needed. Iron a Variety of Clothing & Fabrics With adjustable fabric settings, it's easy to select the right temperature for a variety of different fabrics from cottons and linens to synthetics, silk and wool.

Proctor Silex 1200 Watt Iron & Vertical Steamer Proctor Silex 1500 Watt Iron & Vertical Steamer Proctor Silex Classic 1200 Watt Retro Steam Iron & Vertical Steamer Watts 1200 1500 1200 Steam Blast ✓ ✓ ✓ Other 8' Retractable Cord 7 Temperature Settings

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I did not expect this iron to be this good. It is very lightweight, a little small, but works wonderfully. Steam is great. Automatic shut off is very useful. It's inexpensive. Great iron. Before this one, I had a $100 shark brand iron, and I don't think I would buy it again once I've tried this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Light weight, steams and irons. For the price you can’t go wrong. I prefer ironing but tried the vertical steamer on drapes. Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product for the money.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this iron to tide me over while my Rowenta Steam Station is being repaired. I bought this model specifically because it was the only one I could find that did not have an automatic shutdown after eight minutes. For someone who sews a lot, this is a really annoying feature on an iron. This Proctor Silex stays on for an hour before it turns off, which is much better for sewers. The tank holds quite a bit of water, but on the downside, it is a bit difficult to fill with water. The shot of steam and spritzer are adequate, but the steam output is great. The heat control dial is very difficult to turn, but the highest heat setting is just fine for most fabrics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My perfect sewing partner!
reviews.reviewText: This iron is an upgrade from my previous Proctor Silex. Just love it. The automatic shut-off is fantastic as I get distracted sometimes while sewing. The water level goes down so much slower than my 1st one. Maybe it's larger with this one as I couldn't see my 1st model except for a small gauge on the side. No question about water level on this one. I highly, highly recommend this iron. It is soooo reasonably priced, too. (I have a Eurosteam, too.). This one is a must for a seamstress!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It’s light weight the temperature control works on demand and for steaming clothes it’s perfect because of its light weight and easy use allows you to accomplish your steaming chores quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible design and function is not satisfactory.
reviews.reviewText: Cord gets in the way, continuously! The iron will not sit up on the board, the cord gets in its way even when it is in a sitting! The design of the iron is really just a mess. Why would a control knob be hidden from the eyes, as well as very difficult to get to underneath the curved handle. The advertisement is way off! The water DOES leak, the steamer set position chooses when it will steam on it's own, not a good iron at all. My very first use, when I opened it up, I noticed the holes were all white?, so I ironed an old pillow case. took forever to get the milky looking water to a clean basis. Sure am glad I thought to look at the bottom side.On a positive note, the packaging/box was easy to open.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tested Auto Shut Off, did not turn off laying flat
reviews.reviewText: When this was purchased I could have sworn I read somewhere in the description that it turns off after 30s laying down flat. Tested it just in case (as it’s going into a rental property) and this did not happen. It started smoking at 3.5min laying flat as it burned a hole through a junk towel. Safety and constant monitoring was taken in testing this. Glad I tested this as it did not auto turn off when laying flat. Maybe it would have after an hour though I didn’t want to take that risk. If you are looking for safety I suggest a different iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my second iron in this model , in 20 years . Excellent quality .
The water is leaking .the steam setting doesn't work at all and doesn't heat up properly pls don't buy iti returned mine today
Plancha muy bien! Quita las arrugas rápidamente sin tener q pasar varias veces la plancha!
